name: Queenpins
description: A pair of housewives create a $40 million coupon scam.

review.author: mikegibb-60418
review.heading: Don't be put off by the premise
review.reviewBody: I was kind of reluctant to watch this - a scam by two girls involving grocery coupons didn't sound too promising. In fact, however, it has produced a sweet, funny and very well made film. It moves along at a really good pace and you quickly find yourself rooting for the two of them. The script is sharp and witty and Kristen Bell is delightful in the main part. Not an Oscar nominee but highly entertaining. And the fact that it was inspired by real events gives it an extra edge.
